column8: Reporting to: Operations Manager Overall purpose Oversees the local boutique day to day operations including profitability, inventory management, staff management and customer service excellence. Responsible for ensuring the SOP are adhered to and that the boutiques are at all time in good conditions for operations. Business planning, budgeting, financial management and reporting to management, building and maintaining good rapport with inter-departments and external suppliers, agents and principal are part of the duties of operations manager. Duties and Responsibilities Operational related duties : Responsible for all day to day operations of all boutiques, including but not limited to manpower planning & control, in-store visual & displays controls and maintenance, housekeeping standards of boutiques and any other day to day operational issues. Responsible for ensuring smooth operation procedures and close adhere to operations SOP by all boutiques. To conduct monthly boutique managers’ meeting and boutiques meeting and to ensure all new procedures, practices and updates are communicated and discussed during such meetings. To conduct shop audit at least twice a week to ensure that the general security systems and procedures are adhered to according to security SOP; to ensure boutiques are operating in good conditions; to ensure that staff presentation & service standards are good; to ensure that general boutique housekeeping & presentations are good, etc Responsible for all boutiques setup including renovations, new shop setup and any other related issues. Oversees all Customer Service and related issues, to ensure service standards set are observed by all boutique staff and are strictly adhered to. Responsible for all customers complaints and service recovery. Manpower related: Ensure all boutiques are sufficiently staff and the duties schedule are plan properly and executed according to in house requirements, such as designated PIC for each boutique is on duty at all times, number of manpower required for operation is adhered too, etc. To provide next level support to all boutiques in charge for all manpower related issues, such as disciplinary, counseling and motivating of staff, etc. Responsible for manpower support for all companies events, trainings and any other related activities. Other duties: Ensure proper communication is established with all external agents, principals, suppliers and any other related parties. Build rapport and maintain good working relationships with all external agents, principals, suppliers and any other related parties Qualifications and Experience In order to ensure effective and efficient performance in the job, below will indicate the minimum expectation in terms of educational, professional, training background. Degree in Business Admin, Operation Management , or related discipline At least 5-10 years of direct experience Experience in handling retail stores operations Good analytical ability, effective presentation skill and leadership traits Very Good interpersonal and Communications skills Results oriented and have the ability to exercise judgment within broadly defined requirements in dynamic environment. Benefits Health insurance Bonus (depend on company performance) Location: BTS Ploenchit * The company reserve the right to review, revoke, add or amend the JD stated above at its convenient and needs.
